content.json:
## Enriched Microsoft 365 logs Workbook (Preview)
---

The enriched Microsoft 365 logs provide information about Microsoft 365 workloads, so you can review network data and security events relevant to Microsoft 365 apps.

parameters.name: LogAnalyticWorkspace
parameters.label: Log Analytic Workspace
parameters.description: The Log Analytic Workspace In Which To Execute The Queries

parameters.name: Users
parameters.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| summarize Count = count() by UserId
| order by Count desc, UserId asc
| project Value = UserId, Label = strcat(UserId, ' - ', Count, ' Logs'), Selected = false

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where Workload in ("Exchange")
| extend GeoInfo = geo_info_from_ip_address(SourceIp) // Assuming a function exists to pull geo info
| extend 
    Country = tostring(GeoInfo.country), 
    State = tostring(GeoInfo.state), 
    City = tostring(GeoInfo.city), 
    Latitude = tostring(GeoInfo.latitude), 
    Longitude = tostring(GeoInfo.longitude)
| project 
    UserId, 
    Location = strcat(City, ', ', State, ', ', Country), // Constructing a full location string
    Latitude, 
    Longitude, 
    City, 
    State, 
    Country
| summarize Count = count() by City, State, Country
content.title: Access By Location

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where Workload in ("Exchange")
| summarize ["Count"] = count() by ["Source IP"] = SourceIp, ["Device Operating System"] = DeviceOperatingSystem
| order by ["Count"] desc
content.title: Access By Location And OS

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where Operation in ("Set-AdminAuditLogConfig", "Set-OrganizationConfig")
| project Timestamp = TimeGenerated, ["User ID"] = UserId, ["Client IP"] = ClientIp, Operation
| summarize Count = count() by Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation
| project Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation, Count
| order by Count desc
content.title: Audit Of Critical Configuration Changes

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where Operation in ("Set-TransportRule", "Set-AtpPolicyForO365", "Set-MalwareFilterRule")
| project Timestamp = TimeGenerated, ["User ID"] = UserId, ["Client IP"] = ClientIp, Operation
| summarize Count = count() by Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation
| project Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation, Count
| order by Count desc
content.title: Changes In Email Security Policies

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where Operation in ("Add-RoleGroupMember", "Remove-ManagementRoleAssignment")
| project Timestamp = TimeGenerated, ["User ID"] = UserId, ["Client IP"] = ClientIp, Operation
| summarize Count = count() by Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation
| project Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation, Count
| order by Count desc
content.title: Monitoring Role Group Membership Changes

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where Operation in ("New-TenantAllowBlockListSpoofitems", "Remove-TenantAllowBlockListSpoofitems")
| project Timestamp = TimeGenerated, ["User ID"] = UserId, ["Client IP"] = ClientIp, Operation
| summarize Count = count() by Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation
| project Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation, Count
| order by Count desc
content.title: Spoofing Settings Management Activities

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where Operation in ("New-SafeAttachmentPolicy", "Set-SafeAttachmentPolicy", "Set-SafeAttachmentRule")
| project Timestamp = TimeGenerated, ["User ID"] = UserId, ["Client IP"] = ClientIp, Operation
| summarize Count = count() by Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation
| project Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation, Count
| order by Count desc
content.title: Safe Attachments Policy Changes

content.query: EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs | where Workload == "Exchange" | where Operation in ("Add-MailboxFolderPermission", "Add-RoleGroupMember", "New-TransportRule", "Remove-ManagementRoleAssignment", "Set-TransportRule") | summarize Count = count(), Users = makeset(UserId) by Operation | order by Count desc
content.title: Permission changes and security policy updates

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where Workload in ("Teams")
| extend GeoInfo = geo_info_from_ip_address(SourceIp) // Assuming a function exists to pull geo info
| extend 
    Country = tostring(GeoInfo.country), 
    State = tostring(GeoInfo.state), 
    City = tostring(GeoInfo.city), 
    Latitude = tostring(GeoInfo.latitude), 
    Longitude = tostring(GeoInfo.longitude)
| project 
    UserId, 
    Location = strcat(City, ', ', State, ', ', Country), // Constructing a full location string
    Latitude, 
    Longitude, 
    City, 
    State, 
    Country
| summarize Count = count() by City, State, Country
content.title: Access By Location

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where Workload in ("Teams")
| summarize ["Count"] = count() by ["Source IP"] = SourceIp, ["Device Operating System"] = DeviceOperatingSystem
| order by ["Count"] desc
content.title: Access By Location And OS

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where Workload in ("OneDrive", "SharePoint","SPO/OneDrive")
| extend GeoInfo = geo_info_from_ip_address(SourceIp) // Assuming a function exists to pull geo info
| extend 
    Country = tostring(GeoInfo.country), 
    State = tostring(GeoInfo.state), 
    City = tostring(GeoInfo.city), 
    Latitude = tostring(GeoInfo.latitude), 
    Longitude = tostring(GeoInfo.longitude)
| project 
    UserId, 
    Location = strcat(City, ', ', State, ', ', Country), // Constructing a full location string
    Latitude, 
    Longitude, 
    City, 
    State, 
    Country
| summarize Count = count() by City, State, Country
content.title: Access By Location

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| where Workload in ("OneDrive", "SharePoint", "SPO/OneDrive")
| summarize ["Event Count"] = count() by ["Source IP"] = SourceIp, ["Device Operating System"] = DeviceOperatingSystem
| order by ["Event Count"] desc
content.title: Access By Location And OS

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where Workload == "Teams"
| where Operation in ("MemberAdded", "MemberRemoved", "TeamDeleted")
| project Timestamp = TimeGenerated, ["User ID"] = UserId, ["Client IP"] = ClientIp, Operation
| summarize Count = count() by Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation
| project Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation, Count
| order by Count desc
content.title: Changes In Team Memberships

content.query:
let RiskyExtensions = dynamic(["exe", "msi", "bat", "cmd", "com", "scr", "pif", "ps1", "vbs", "js", "jse", "wsf", "docm", "xlsm", "pptm", "dll", "ocx", "cpl", "app", "vb", "reg", "inf", "hta"]);

EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where Workload in ("SPO/OneDrive")
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| extend ["File Extension"] = tostring(parse_json(AdditionalProperties).SourceFileExtension)
| where ["File Extension"] in (RiskyExtensions)
| project Timestamp = TimeGenerated, ["User ID"] = UserId, ["Client IP"] = ClientIp, ["File Extension"], Operation
| summarize Count = count() by Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], ["File Extension"], Operation
| project Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], ["File Extension"], Operation, Count
content.title: Risky File Operations

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where Workload in ("OneDrive", "SharePoint", "SPO/OneDrive")
| where Operation in ("FileRecycled", "FileDownloaded", "FileUploaded", "FileCreated", "File Modified")
| project Timestamp = TimeGenerated, ["User ID"] = UserId, ["Client IP"] = ClientIp, Operation
| summarize Count = count() by Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation
| project Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation, Count
| order by Count desc
content.title: Bulk File Events

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where Workload in ("SPO/OneDrive")
| where Operation == "FileDeletedFirstStageRecycleBin"
| project Timestamp = TimeGenerated, ["User ID"] = UserId, ["Client IP"] = ClientIp, Operation
| summarize Count = count() by bin(Timestamp, 1h), ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation
| project Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation, Count
| order by Count desc
| where Count > 1
content.title: Bulk File Deletion Operations

content.query:
let baselinePeriod = 30d;
let detectionWindow = 1h;
let downloadThreshold = 5; // Threshold of downloads indicating potential exfiltration

EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where TimeGenerated >= ago(baselinePeriod)
| where Workload in ("OneDrive", "SharePoint", "SPO/OneDrive")
| where Operation == "FileDownloaded"
| project Timestamp = TimeGenerated, ["User ID"] = UserId, ["Client IP"] = ClientIp, Operation
| summarize Count = count() by bin(Timestamp, detectionWindow), ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation
| project Timestamp, ["User ID"], ["Client IP"], Operation, Count
| order by Count desc
content.title: Bulk File Download

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| extend GeoInfo = geo_info_from_ip_address(SourceIp) // Assuming a function exists to pull geo info
| extend 
    Country = tostring(GeoInfo.country), 
    State = tostring(GeoInfo.state), 
    City = tostring(GeoInfo.city), 
    Latitude = tostring(GeoInfo.latitude), 
    Longitude = tostring(GeoInfo.longitude)
| project 
    UserId, 
    Location = strcat(City, ', ', State, ', ', Country), // Constructing a full location string
    Latitude, 
    Longitude, 
    City, 
    State, 
    Country
      | where tostring(Country) != ""
| summarize Count = count() by City, State, Country
content.title: Access By Location

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| summarize ["Event Count"] = count() by ["Time Generated"] = TimeGenerated, ["User"] = UserId, ["Source IP"] = SourceIp, ["Device Operating System"] = DeviceOperatingSystem, ["Workload"] = Workload
| order by ["Time Generated"] desc
content.title: Access By Location And OS

content.query:
let data = EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| project 
    Operation, 
    UserId, 
    Workload, 
    SourceIp, 
    DeviceId, 
    TimeGenerated, 
    Details = pack_all(),
    OS = tostring(DeviceOperatingSystem)
| extend Workload = tostring(Workload)
| extend WorkloadStatus = case(
    Workload == "Exchange", "Exchange",
    Workload == "Teams", "Teams",
    Workload == "SharePoint", "SharePoint",
    "Other"
);

let appData = data
| summarize 
    TotalCount = count(), 
    ExchangeCount = countif(Workload == "Exchange"), 
    TeamsCount = countif(Workload == "Teams"), 
    SharePointCount = countif(Workload == "SharePoint"), 
    OtherCount = countif(Workload == "Other") 
    by UserId
| where UserId != ''
| join kind=inner (
    data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by UserId
    | project-away TimeGenerated
  ) on UserId
| order by TotalCount desc, UserId asc
| project UserId, TotalCount, ExchangeCount, TeamsCount, SharePointCount, OtherCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number();

data
| summarize 
    TotalCount = count(), 
    ExchangeCount = countif(Workload == "Exchange"), 
    TeamsCount = countif(Workload == "Teams"), 
    SharePointCount = countif(Workload == "SharePoint"), 
    OtherCount = countif(Workload == "Other") 
    by UserId, SourceIp = tostring(SourceIp)
| join kind=inner (
    data
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on TimeGenerated in range({TimeRange:start}, {TimeRange:end}, {TimeRange:grain}) by UserId, SourceIp
    | project-away TimeGenerated
  ) on UserId, SourceIp
| order by TotalCount desc, UserId asc
| project UserId, SourceIp, TotalCount, ExchangeCount, TeamsCount, SharePointCount, OtherCount, Trend
| serialize Id = row_number(1000000)
| join kind=inner (appData) on UserId
| project Id, Name = SourceIp, Type = 'Client IP', ['Events Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ['Exchange Events'] = ExchangeCount, ['Teams Events'] = TeamsCount, ['SharePoint Events'] = SharePointCount, ['Other Count'] = OtherCount, ParentId = Id1
| union (
    appData 
    | project Id, Name = UserId, Type = 'Operating System', ['Events Count'] = TotalCount, Trend, ['Exchange Events'] = ExchangeCount, ['Teams Events'] = TeamsCount, ['SharePoint Events'] = SharePointCount, ['Other Count'] = OtherCount, ParentId = -1
  )
| order by ['Events Count'] desc, Name asc
content.title: Activity Log

content.json: ðŸ’¡ _Click on a segment of the pie chart to explore more details_

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| extend 
    OS = coalesce(DeviceOperatingSystem, "Unknown OS"),
    OSVersion = coalesce(tostring(DeviceOperatingSystemVersion), "Unknown Version")
| summarize DeviceCount = count() by OS, OSVersion
| order by DeviceCount desc
content.title: Devices Accessing M365

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| extend 
    ["Operating System"] = coalesce(DeviceOperatingSystem, "Unknown OS"),
    ["OS Version"] = coalesce(tostring(DeviceOperatingSystemVersion), "Unknown Version"),
    ["Device ID"] = coalesce(tostring(DeviceId), "Unknown DeviceId")
| where ["Operating System"] == dynamic({Parampie}).label
| summarize ["Device Count"] = count() by ["Operating System"], ["OS Version"], ["Device ID"]
| order by ["Device Count"] desc

let BusinessHoursStart = 8; // 8 AM
let BusinessHoursEnd = 18; // 6 PM

EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs 
| where UserId in ({Users}) or '*' in ({Users})
| extend HourOfDay = hourofday(TimeGenerated)
| where HourOfDay < BusinessHoursStart or HourOfDay > BusinessHoursEnd
| summarize ["Off-Hour Activities"] = count() by ["User ID"] = UserId, ["Date"] = bin(TimeGenerated, 1d), ["Operation"]
| order by ["Off-Hour Activities"] desc
content.title: Activity Outside Standard Working Hours (8:00 - 18:00)

content.query:
EnrichedMicrosoft365AuditLogs
| summarize Count = count() by bin(TimeGenerated, 1h)
| order by TimeGenerated asc
content.title: Microsoft 365 Transactions
